examples.en: The dog trails its tail behind.
Yesterday, I trailed behind the group.
The hiker trailed through the forest yesterday.
examples.zh: 昨天，徒步旅行者穿过森林时拖着脚步。

examples.en: She has trailed behind the group all day.
examples.zh: 她一整天都跟在团队后面。

examples.en: The hiker has trailed through the forest all morning.
examples.zh: 徒步旅行者一早就在森林里拖着脚步。
